GK19suvasavu:2: paśyanti sūkṣmamatayaḥ sā jayati sarasvatī devī // SuVas_1 //
GK19suvasavu:3: khinno 'si muñca śailaṃ bibhṛmo vayam iti vadatsu śithilabhujaḥ /
GK19suvasavu:4: bharabhugnavitatabāhuṣu gopeṣu hasan harir jayati // SuVas_2 //
GK19suvasavu:6: rājanti valivibhaṅgāḥ sa pātu dāmodaro bhavataḥ // SuVas_3 //
GK19suvasavu:7: sa jayati himakaralekhā cakāsti yasyotsukomayā nihitā /
GK19suvasavu:11: viṣadharato 'py ativiṣamaḥ khala iti na mṛṣā vadanti vidvāṃsaḥ /
GK19suvasavu:12: yad ayaṃ nakuladveṣī sa kuladveṣī punaḥ piśunaḥ // SuVas_6 //
GK19suvasavu:13: atimaline kartavye bhavati khalānām atīva nipuṇā dhīḥ /
GK19suvasavu:14: timire hi kauśikānāṃ rūpaṃ pratipadyate dṛṣṭiḥ // SuVas_7 //
GK19suvasavu:15: hasta iva bhūtimalino laṅghayati yathā yathā khalaḥ sujanam /
GK19suvasavu:16: darpaṇam iva taṃ kurute tathā tathā nirmalacchāyam // SuVas_8 //
GK19suvasavu:18: antaritaśaśirucām api salilamucāṃ malinim ābhyadhikaḥ // SuVas_9 //
GK19suvasavu:19: sā rasavattā nihatā navakā vilasanti carati no kaṅkaḥ /
GK19suvasavu:20: sarasīva kīrtiśeṣaṃ gatavati bhuvi vikramāditye // SuVas_10 //
GK19suvasavu:22: anadhigataparimalāpi hi harati dṛśaṃ mālatīmālā // SuVas_11 //
GK19suvasavu:23: guṇinām api nijarūpapratipattiḥ parata eva saṃbhavati /
GK19suvasavu:24: svamahimadarśanam akṣṇor mukuratale jāyate yasmāt // SuVas_12 //
GK19suvasavu:29: ṇṛsiṃha iva darśitakaśipukṣetradānavismayaḥ, kṛṣṇa iva kṛtavasudevatarpaṇaḥ, nārāyaṇa iva
GK19suvasavu:30: kaṃsārātir iva janitayaśodānandasamṛddhiḥ, ānakadundubhir iva kṛtakāvyādaraḥ, sāgaraśāyīvānantabhogīcūḍāmaṇirañjitapādaḥ,
GK19suvasavu:31: ivāśāntarakṣaṇaḥ, agastya iva dakṣiṇāśāprasādhakaḥ, jalanidhir iva vāhinīśatanāyakaḥ samakarapracāraś ca, hara iva mahāsenānuyāto
GK19suvasavu:32: nirjitamāraś ca, merur iva vibudhālayo viśvakarmāśrayaś ca, ravir iva kṣaṇadānapriyaś cchāyāsantāpaharaś ca, kusumaketur iva janitāniruddhasaṃpad ratisukhapradaś ca, vidyādharo 'pi sumanāḥ,
GK19suvasavu:36: 2) yatra ca śāsati dharaṇimaṇḍalaṃ chalanigrahaprayogā vādeṣu, nāstikatā
GK19suvasavu:37: cārvākeṣu, kaṇṭakayogo niyogeṣu, parīvādo vīṇāsu, khalasaṃyogaḥ śāliṣu,
GK19suvasavu:41: duḥśāsanadarśanaṃ bhārate, karapatradāraṇaṃ jalajānāṃ, param evaṃ vyavasthitam |
GK19suvasavu:43: rāghavaḥ pariharann api janakabhuvaṃ janakabhuvā saha vanaṃ viveśa |
GK19suvasavu:44: bharato 'pi rāmadarśitabhaktir api rājye virāmam akarot |
GK19suvasavu:45: nalasya damayantyā militasyāpi punar bhūparigraho jātaḥ |
GK19suvasavu:50: sarvataḥ kaṭakasaṃcāriṇo gandharvān darśitaśṛṅgonnatiḥ sukhayan na virarāma |
GK19suvasavu:51: sa himālayo nāvaśyāyocchalitaḥ no māyājanmane hitaś ca |
GK19suvasavu:52: asau hi mānī giri sthito vṛṣadhvajaś ca |
GK19suvasavu:55: sa ratnākaro 'nahimayaḥ, katham agādhaḥ, samaryādaḥ, nodreko 'py asya vismayaḥ,
GK19suvasavu:56: himakarāśrayo 'mṛtamayaḥ, satpātraḥ, tasyācalo na krodhaḥ, mahānadīnaḥ,
GK19suvasavu:61: mitrodayahetuḥ, kāñcana śobhāṃ bibhrat, acalādhikalakṣmīḥ sumerur iva |
GK19suvasavu:62: yasya ca ripuvargaḥ sadā pārtho 'pi na mahābhārataraṇayogyaḥ, bhīṣmo 'py
GK19suvasavu:64: api ca sa triśaṅkur iva nakṣatrapathasthalitaḥ, śaṅkaro 'pi na viṣādī, pāvako 'pi na kṛṣṇavartmā,
GK19suvasavu:65: āśrayāśo ['pi] na dahanaḥ, nāntaka ivākasmād apahṛtajīvanaḥ, na rāhur mitramaṇḍalagrahaṇavardhitaruciḥ, na nala iva kalivilasitavinaṭitaḥ, na cakrīva śṛgālavadhastutisamullasitaḥ, nandagopa iva yaśodayānvitaḥ,
GK19suvasavu:66: jarāsandha iva ghaṭitasandhivigrahaḥ, bhārgava iva sadānabhogaḥ, daśaratha iva sumitropetaḥ sumantrādhiṣṭhitaś ca, dilīpa iva sudakṣiṇānugato
GK19suvasavu:67: rakṣitaguś ca, rāma iva janitakuśalavayo rūpocchrāyaḥ |
GK19suvasavu:69: ivāśritanandanaḥ, himālaya iva janitaśivaḥ, mandara iva bhogibhogāṅkitaḥ,
GK19suvasavu:70: kailāsa iva maheśvaropabhuktakoṭiḥ, madhur iva nānārāmānandakaraḥ,
GK19suvasavu:72: ivollāsitaratiḥ, īśānabhūtisañcaya iva sandhyocchalitaḥ, śaranmegha ivāvadātahṛdayo viṣṇupadāvalambī ca, pārtha iva samarasāhasocitaḥ, kaṃsa iva kuvalayāpīḍabhūṣitaḥ, tārkṣya iva [vinatānandakaraḥ] sumukhanandana[ś
GK19suvasavu:73: ca], viṣṇur iva kroḍīkṛtasutanuḥ, śāntanava iva svavaśasthāpitakāladharmaḥ, kauravavyūha iva suśarmādhiṣṭhitaḥ, subāhur api rāmānandī, samadṛṣṭir api maheśvaro, muktāmayo 'py ataralamadhyo,
GK19suvasavu:78: sudūravartitajīvanāḥ, prasannasattvāḥ santaḥ parām ṛddhim avāpuḥ prajālokāḥ |
GK19suvasavu:80: kusumaśarāsanasya, makaraketor iva darśanena vanitājanasya hṛdayam ullalāsa |
GK19suvasavu:87: yasya [ca] samarabhuvi bhujadaṇḍena kodaṇḍaṃ, kodaṇḍena bāṇāḥ, bānai ripuśiraḥ, tenāpi
GK19suvasavu:88: bhūmaṇḍalaṃ, tena cānanubhūtapūrvo nāyakaḥ, nāyakena ca kīrtiḥ, kīrtyā ca saptasāgarāḥ, sāgaraiḥ kṛtayugādi rājacaritasmaraṇaṃ, anena ca sthairyaṃ,
GK19suvasavu:90: yasya ca pratāpānaladagdhānāṃ ripusundarīṇāṃ karatalatāḍanabhītair iva muktāhāraiḥ payodharaparisaro muktaḥ |
GK19suvasavu:96: 5) atha sa kadācid avasannāyāṃ yāmavatyāṃ dadhidhavale kālakṣapaṇakapiṇḍa iva niśāyamunāphenastabake, menakānakhamarjanaśilāśakala iva madhucchatracchāyamaṇḍalodare, paścimācalopadhānasukhanilīnaśirasaḥ,
GK19suvasavu:97: tāḍaṅka iva śeṣamadhubhāji, caṣaka iva vibhāvarīvadhvāḥ,
GK19suvasavu:102: sakalanipītaniśātimirasaṃghātam atitanīyastayā soḍhum asamartheṣv iva kajjalavyājād udvamatsu,
GK19suvasavu:104: vividhabudhāśrayabhavanavicitrasuratakrīḍāsākṣiṣu, śaraṇāgatam ivādhonilīnaṃ timiram avatsu, durjanavacaneṣv iva dagdhasnehatayā
GK19suvasavu:105: mandimānam upagateṣu, ativṛddheṣv iva daśāntam upagateṣu,
GK19suvasavu:106: vipannasadīśvareṣv iva pātramātraśeṣeṣu, dānaveṣv iva niśāntapathacāriṣu,
GK19suvasavu:109: mlānimānam upagacchatsu vāsāgārakusumopahāreṣu, vigalitakundair alakaiḥ priyavirahaśokād bāṣpabindūn utsṛjadbhir iva priyatamagamananiṣedham iva
GK19suvasavu:116: śaradvāsaralakṣmīṣv iva nakhālaṅkṛtapayodharāsu, āsannamaraṇāsv iva jīviteśapurābhimukhīṣu, vasantavanarājiṣv ivotkalikābahulāsu, priyair āliṅgyamānāsu kāminīṣu, āndolitakusumakesare,
GK19suvasavu:117: keśareṇumuṣiraṇitamadhukaramaṇīnāṃ ramaṇīnāṃ, vikacakumudākare mudākare saṅgabhāji, priyavirahitāsu rahitāsu sukhena murmuram iva varṣati samantād arpake darpakeṣu dahanasya, dūraprasāritakokapriyatamārute mārute vahati,
GK19suvasavu:124: gurunitambapayodharakumbhapīḍājanitāyāseneva, payodharakalaśayoḥ kathaṃ mayy eva pāto bhaviṣyatīti cintayeva, gṛhītagurukalatrānuśayeneva,
GK19suvasavu:125: vidhātur atipīḍayato hastaparāmarśajanitaparikleśeneva kṣīṇataratām upagatena madhyabhāgenālaṅkṛtām,
GK19suvasavu:126: cūcuka[mudrā]sanāthābhyām, atigurupariṇāhatayā patanabhayakhillitābhyām iva cūcukacchalena vidhinā iva kīlitābhyāṃ,
GK19suvasavu:136: taruṇaketakadaladrāghīyasā pakṣmalacaṭulālasena hṛdayāvāsagṛhāvasthitasya hṛcchayavilāsino gavākṣaśaṅkām upajanayatā, sarāgeṇāpi nirvāṇaṃ janayatā,
GK19suvasavu:137: gatiprasararodhakaśravaṇakṛtakopenevopāntalohitena dhavalayateva jagadaśeṣaṃ, utphullakamalakānanasanātham iva gaganaṃ kurvatā,
GK19suvasavu:138: dugdhāmbhonidhisahasrāṇīvodvamatā, kundalīlotpalamālatīmālālakṣmīm upahasatā nayanayugalena vibhūṣitāṃ, daśanaratnatulādaṇḍena nayanasetusamuddhatabandhena yauvanamanmathavāraṇavaraṇḍakeneva
GK19suvasavu:145: ivātikrāntakanyātulāṃ, uṣām ivāniruddhadarśanasukhāṃ, śacīm iva vandanekṣaṇaruciṃ, paśupatitāṇḍavalīlām ivollasaccakṣuḥśravasaṃ, aṭavīm
GK19suvasavu:146: ivottuṅgaśyāmalakucāṃ, vānarasenām iva sugrīvāṅgaśobhitāṃ, śanaiś careṇa pādena saumyena darśanena guruṇā nitambena, lohitenādhareṇa vikacena vilocanena bhāsvatālaṅkāreṇa, grahamayīm iva saṃsārabhitticitralekhām iva trailokyasaundaryasaṅketabhūmim iva rasāñjanasiddhim iva yauvanasya,
GK19suvasavu:147: saṃkalpavṛttim iva śṛṅgārasya, nidhānam iva kautukasya, vijayapatākām iva makaradhvajasya, abhibhūtim iva madanakāntābhyāḥ, saṅketabhūmim iva lāvaṇyasya, staṃbhanacūrṇam ivendriyāṇāṃ, mohanaśaktim iva manmathasya,
GK19suvasavu:148: vihārasthalīm iva saundaryasya, ekāyatanaśālām iva saubhāgyasya,
GK19suvasavu:151: tribhuvanavilocanamṛṣṭim iva prajāpateḥ kanyakām aṣṭādaśavarṣadeśīyām apaśyat svapne |
GK19suvasavu:152: 6) atha tāṃ prītivistāritena pibann iva cakṣuṣā, janiterṣyayeva nidrayā cirasevitayā mumuce
GK19suvasavu:153: vibuddhas tu viṣasarasīva durjanavacasīva nimagnam ātmānam avadhārayituṃ na śaśāka |
GK19suvasavu:154: tathā hi kṣaṇam ākāśatalāliṅganārthaṃ prasāritabāhuyugalaḥ "ehy ehi priyatame, mā gaccha mā gaccheti" dikṣu vidikṣu ca vilikhitām ivotkīrṇām iva cakṣuṣi nikhātām iva hṛdaye priyām ājuhāva |
GK19suvasavu:155: tatas tatraiva śayyātale nilīno niṣiddhāśeṣaparijanadarśano dattakapāṭaḥ parihṛtatāmbūlāhārādisakalopabhogas taṃ divasam anayat |
GK19suvasavu:157: 7) atha tasya priyasakho Makarando nāma katham api labdhapraveśaḥ kandarpasāyakaprahāravivaśaṃ Kandarpaketum uvāca |
GK19suvasavu:158: "sakhe, kim idam asāmpratam asādhujanocitacaritam āśrito 'si? tavaitad ālokya [caritaṃ]
GK19suvasavu:160: khalā(ḥ) punas tat tad aniṣṭam anucitam evāvadhārayanti |
GK19suvasavu:164: āśrayāśo 'pi mātariśvā, atikaṭur api mahārasaḥ, sarṣapasneha iva karayugalālito 'pi śirasā dhṛto 'pi na kāṭavaṃ jahāti |
GK19suvasavu:168: viṣataruprasava iva yathā yathānubhūyate tathā tathā moham eva draḍhayati |
GK19suvasavu:170: nidāghadivasa iva matsaro vahati saṃtāpaṃ sumanasām |
GK19suvasavu:178: vṛṣabha iva surabhiyānavikalaḥ kāmīva gotraskhalanavidhuro vāmādhvānuraktaś ca |
GK19suvasavu:179: ajīrṇavikāra iva kalevare 'pi vacasi mandimānam āvahati |
GK19suvasavu:180: vañcaka iva raktaḥ kaṭukaphalena vibhāvarīraktaś ca |
GK19suvasavu:183: kuddāla iva dalitagotraḥ kṣamābhājaḥ prāṇino nikṛntati |
GK19suvasavu:185: duṣṭaśūrpaśrutir iva kānanarucir anugatam api yavasaṃ tataṃ nānumodate |
GK19suvasavu:186: abījād eva jāyante 'kāṇḍāt prasaranti khalavyasanāṅkurāḥ durucchedāś ca bhavanti |
GK19suvasavu:187: asatāṃ hṛdi praviṣṭo hi doṣalavaḥ karālāyate, satāṃ na viśaty
GK19suvasavu:188: eva hṛdayam, bhūyo yadi katham api viśati tadā pārada iva kṣaṇamātraṃ na tiṣṭhati |
GK19suvasavu:190: sukhaṃ janā hi bhavādṛśāḥ śaratsamayā iva haranti na ca mitrasya sacetanā visadṛśam upadiśanti
GK19suvasavu:192: [tathā hi] mādhuryaśaityaśucitvatāpaśāntibhiḥ payaḥ paya iti nimittatām upagatasya dugdhasya matsamāgamād vardhitasya kvāthe puro mamaiva kṣayo yukta iti vicintyeva vāriṇāpi kṣīyate tad idam asāṃpratam ācaritam |
GK19suvasavu:194: sādhavo hi mohāt param utpathapravṛttā bhavantītyādi" vadati tasmin katham api smaraprahāraparavaśaḥ parimitākṣaram uvāca [Kandarpaketuḥ] |
GK19suvasavu:203: tad adhunā yadi tvaṃ sahapāṃsukṛīḍitasamaduḥkhasukho 'si tadā mām anugacchety" uktvā parijanālakṣitas tena sahaiva purān nirjagāma |
GK19suvasavu:210: sarabhasakesarisahasrakharanakharadhārāvidāritamattamātaṅgakumbhasthalagalitamuktāphalaśabalaśikharatayā śirolagnaṃ tārāgaṇam ivodvahan, sugrīva iva ṛkṣagavayaśarabhakesarikumudasevyamānapādacchāyaḥ, paśupatir iva nāganiḥśvāsasamutkṣiptabhūtiḥ, janārdana iva vicitravanamālaḥ,
GK19suvasavu:211: sahasrakiraṇa iva saptapatrasyandanopetaḥ, virūpākṣa iva sannihitaguhaḥ
GK19suvasavu:212: śivānugataś ca, kāmīva kāntāroṣarasānugataḥ samadanaś ca, śrīparvataḥ iva sannihitamallikārjunaḥ, naravāhanadatta iva priyaṅguśyāmāsanāthaḥ, śiśur iva kṛtadhātrīdhṛtiḥ, vāsarārambha ivāruṇaprabhāpāṭalitapatravanarājiḥ,
GK19suvasavu:213: kṛṣṇapakṣa iva bahulatāgahanaḥ, karṇa ivānubhūtaśatakoṭidānaḥ, bhīṣma iva śikhaṇḍimuktair ardhacandrai rācitaḥ, kāmasūtravinyāsa iva mallanāgaghaṭitakāntārasāmoditaḥ, hiraṇyakaśipur iva śambarakulāśrayaḥ,
GK19suvasavu:216: ivodvīkṣamāṇaḥ, srastāntranāla iva jaradajagarabhogaiḥ, kumbhakarṇa iva dantāntarālagatavānaravyūhaḥ,
GK19suvasavu:219: 'py aparimāṇaḥ, sanado 'pi niḥśabdaḥ, bhīmo 'pi kīcakasuhṛt, pihitāmbaro
GK19suvasavu:221: 9) yaś ca pravṛddhagulmatayaiveha dṛśyamānabahudhātuvikāraḥ, sādhur iva sānugrahapracāraprakaṭitamahimā, mīmāṃsānyāya iva pihitadigambaradarśanaḥ
GK19suvasavu:222: | yaś ca harivaṃśair iva puṣkaraprādurbhāvaramaṇīyaiḥ, rāśibhir iva mīnamithunakulīrasaṅgataiḥ, karaṇair iva śakunināgabhadrabālabakulopetaiḥ
GK19suvasavu:248: daṃṣṭrākoṭivisaṅkaṭāsyakuharaḥ kurvan saṭām utkaṭām utkarṇaḥ kurute kramaṃ karipatau krūrākṛtiḥ kesarī // SuVas_15 //
GK19suvasavu:249: api ca utkarṇo 'yam akāṇḍacaṇḍimakuṭaḥ sphāratsphuratkesaraḥ krūrākārakarālakāyavikaṭaḥ stabdhordhvalāṅgūlabhṛt /
GK19suvasavu:250: citreṇāpi na śakyate vilikhituṃ sarvāṅgasaṅkocabhāk cītkurvadgirikuñjakuñjaraśiraḥ kumbhasthalastho hariḥ // SuVas_16 //
GK19suvasavu:257: katipayapadaṃ gatvā, kāmina iva madanaśalākāṅkitasya, vikartanasyeva
GK19suvasavu:258: snigdhacchāyasya, vaikuṇṭhasyeva lakṣmībhṛtaḥ, yātrodyatanṛpater iva ghanapatraśobhitasya, vedasyeva bhūriśākhālaṅkṛtasya,
GK19suvasavu:260: 11) atrāntare bhagavān api marīcimālī ātapaklāntamattamahiṣalocanapāṭalamaṇḍalaś caramācalaśṛṅgam āruroha |
GK19suvasavu:261: 12) tato Makarandaḥ phalamūlāny ādāya katham api tam abhininditāhāraparicayam akārṣīt |
GK19suvasavu:263: atha tām eva priyatamāṃ ḥṛdayaphalake saṃkalpatūlikayā likhitām avalokayan niṣyandakaraṇagrāmaḥ Kandarpaketur Makarandaviracitapallavaśayane suṣvāpa |
GK19suvasavu:264: athārdhayāmamātrakhaṇḍitāyāṃ vibhāvaryāṃ tatra jambūtaruśikhare mithaḥ kalahāyamānayoḥ śukaśārikayoḥ kalakalaṃ śrutvā, Kandarpaketur Makarandam uvāca |
GK19suvasavu:268: śārikāntaram anviṣya samāgato 'si, katham itarathā rātrir iyatī taveti" |
GK19suvasavu:273: śālabhañjikopaśobhitaiḥ, vṛttair iva samāṇavakakrīḍitaiḥ, kariyūthair iva samattavāraṇaiḥ, sugrīvasainyair iva sagavākṣaiḥ, balibhavanair iva sutalasanniveśair veśmabhir udbhāsitaṃ, dhanadenāpi pracetasā,
GK19suvasavu:274: prajāpālenāpi rāmeṇa, priyaṃvadenāpi puṣpaketunā, bharatenāpi śatrughnena,
GK19suvasavu:300: chandovicitir iva mālinīsanāthā, grahapaṅktir iva sūryātmajopaśobhitā
GK19suvasavu:302: ca, hatāndhatamasāpi tamasānvitā, [vīcikalitāpy avīcidurgamā] bhagavatī Bhāgarathī pravahati
GK19suvasavu:303: 15) [yac ca] diśi diśi kusumanikaram iva tārāgaṇam udvahadbhiḥ,
GK19suvasavu:307: bharatacaritair iva sadārāmāśritaiḥ, mahāvīrair iva nārikeladharaiḥ,
GK19suvasavu:308: asaṃskṛtataruṇair iva dūraprasāritākṣaiḥ, tapasvibhir iva japāsaktaiḥ,
GK19suvasavu:310: ivotkarṇakesaraiḥ, sāriṣṭair api cirajīvibhiḥ, muniyutair api madanādhiṣṭhitaiḥ, upavanapādapair upaśobhitaṃ, aditijaṭharam
GK19suvasavu:312: ca, surālayair api pavitraṃ, bhogibhir api nirupadrutam |

GK19suvasavu:322: 17) yatra ca rājanīticature caturambudhimekhalāyā bhuvo nāyake śāsati vasumatīṃ pitṛkārye vṛṣotsargaḥ, śaśinaḥ kanyātulārohaḥ, yogeṣu

GK19suvasavu:396: asya kāntiviśeṣa" iti, "vṛthaiva damayantī nalasya kṛte vana[vāsa]vaiśasam
GK19suvasavu:397: avāpa, mudhaivendumatī mahiṣy apy ajānurāgiṇī babhūva, aphalam iva duṣyantasya kṛte śakuntalāpi durvāsasaḥ śāpam anubabhūva, nirarthakam iva madanamañjukā naravāhanadattaṃ cakame, niṣkāraṇam

GK19suvasavu:411: keśakalāpapāśam, tarale Lavaṅgavati vikira ketakadhūliṃ, Mālini alaṃ śaivaladalena, capale Citralekhe likha citre cittacoraṃ janaṃ, bhāmini Vilāsavati vikṣipa muktācūrṇanikaram, rāgiṇi Rāgalekhe sthagaya
GK19suvasavu:412: nalinīdalasamūhena payodharabharam, sukānte Kāntimati mandaṃ mandam apanaya bāṣpabindūn, yū(thi)kālaṅkṛte Yū(thi)ke sañcāraya
GK19suvasavu:413: nalinīdalārdravātān, ehi bhagavati nidre anugṛhāṇa mām, dhig indriyair aparaiḥ, kim iti locanamayāni mamāṅgāni vidhinā na kṛtāni, bhagavan kusumāyudha tavāyam añjalir anucaro, bhava bhāvavati tādṛśe jane,
GK19suvasavu:414: [malayānila] suratotkaṇṭhadīkṣāguro vaha yatheccham" iti bahuvidhaṃ bhāṣamāṇā Vāsavadattā sakhījanena samaṃ mumūrccha |

GK19suvasavu:857: kaścit karṇa iva viklavībhūtasarvāṅgaḥ śaktimokṣaṇam akarot |
GK19suvasavu:858: tato vidhvastadhvajapaṭaṃ patatpatākaṃ cyutacāpacāmarāpīḍaṃ skhalatkhaḍgadhenukaṃ tatsamastasainyam anyonyaṃ nidhanam avāpa |
GK19suvasavu:859: 59) anantaraṃ yasyāśramas tena muninā puṣpādikam ādāyāgatena
GK19suvasavu:860: pratipannasarvavṛttāntena "mamāyam āśramo bhagna iti śilāmayī bhaveti"
GK19suvasavu:862: anantaraṃ "varākī bahuduḥkham anubhavatīti" karuṇayāryaputrasya sparśāvadhi śāpāntam akarot
GK19suvasavu:863: 60) tataḥ Kandarpaketuḥ samāgatena Makarandena Vāsavadattayā saha svapuraṃ gatvā hṛdayābhilaṣitāni tāni tāni suratasukhāny anubhavan kālaṃ nināya ||
GK19suvasavu:864: iti mahākavi-Subandhu-viracitā Vāsavadattā nāma kathā samāptā |
